creditline: The Richard and Beverly Fink Endowment for Art Acquisition and gift of funds from William Neumann and James Boyle
description: dark blue field covered with white scratch-like marks forming a swirl in TR and a smaller one at BL; wide side margins and narrow top/bottom margins; floating mount in white wood frame
signed: BR in margin, graphite: K.K / Smith / 2021 / 1/13
text: Powerful, energy-filled whorls emerge from within the deep blue hues of the paper. In this work, artist Kiki Smith conveys something similar to a satellite view of meteorological phenomena such as a hurricane or even the flight patterns of birds. The lines seem to swirl and move across the work. As we follow them in their circular motion, Smith draws us into the chaos and beauty of the natural world.
title: Force III
